issue.title: [CF 295] show timer text of meta icon
issue.body:
If the icon only checked "Show timer text" and Uncheck "show timer", meta icon is can't show the timer text.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #295 | Raw

comments.body:
Drycoded a fix; let me know if it actually works.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yeah it works.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
